summary: Comprehensive testing of TechResona SEO website completed. Backend APIs 80% functional, frontend fully responsive and working. Admin panel fully operational with all CRUD features.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns HTML instead of robots.txt content
Returns HTML instead of XML sitemap

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for blog creation

passed_tests: Homepage loading with semantic HTML5 structure
Navigation to all pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, Blog)
Blog listing page showing 5 seeded blog posts
Individual blog post pages with proper content
SEO Manager meta tags CRUD operations
Blog Manager CRUD operations (6 blogs displayed)
API endpoints for robots.txt and sitemap generation
Public blog and SEO API endpoints
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix routing configuration for /robots.txt and /sitemap.xml endpoints. These should serve the actual content instead of returning the React app HTML. The API endpoints work correctly but direct SEO endpoints are not properly routed.
